workflows 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

workflows

The goal of workflows is to bundle a parsnip model specification with a preprocessing formula or recipe.

Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("DavisVaughan/workflows")
